oai_dc:dc.dc:title: New Hay Market
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The City Hay Market was located on Fourth Avenue South between McGavock and Demonbreun Streets. It was used mainly for the sale and swapping of horses, mules and cows. The hay brought in for the animals gave the market its name. 4 x 6 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hay; Markets
Nashville (Tenn.); Fourth Avenue South; McGavock Street; Demonbreun Street
